title: Vaigai Sirichaa Lyrics Thoonga Nagaram
stanzas:
Vaigai sirichaa
thoongaanagaram
vaandum moraichaa
thoongaa nagaram
edhukkum thuninjaa
thoongaa nagaram
dhukkam tholainjaa
thoonga nagaram

Sangathamizha
thoongaa nagaram.
landhu thamizhaa
thoongaa nagaram.
edhiri merandaa
thoongaa nagaram.
namma madhura thaandaa
thoongaa nagaram.

Maan koottam alaiyum
Periyaar Bussu nilaiyam
pasangaloada idhayam
paayum pulipola maarum

thettarukku poanaa
A/C keesi venaam
visiladikkum kaaththu
vandhu visirividum Fan-aa

Emanoadu moadhum
adangaadha veeram.
natpukku munney
adhu pooppoala maarum.

naduchaamam kooda
koraiyaadhu rousu
andhaikke muzhikka nanga
Class eduppoam bossu

Vaigai sirichaa
thoongaanagaram
vaandum moraichaa
thoongaa nagaram
edhukkum thuninjaa
thoongaa nagaram
dhukkam tholainjaa
thoonga nagaram

seo.title: Vaigai Sirichaa Lyrics Thoonga Nagaram
seo.description: Get the complete Vaigai Sirichaa Lyrics Thoonga Nagaram from Thoonga Nagaram. composed by Sundar C Babu and sung by Madhu Balakrishnan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Thoonga Nagaram, Sundar C Babu, Madhu Balakrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
